message.content:
1. A cerebral infarction was detected in the basal ganglia.
2. An action was performed after the detection of the cerebral infarction.
3. This action was done at regular intervals.

messages.content:
Statement: This was done at regular intervals after cerebral infarction in the basal ganglia was detected.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
